title.narrative: Emergency shelter support for the most vulnerable cyclone Amphan affected Female Headed families in Khulna, Satkhira, Patuakhali and Barguna districts of Bangladesh.

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to provide emergency lifesaving shelter cash assistance and technical support in Khulna, Satkhira, Barguna and Patuakhali districts. UNDP will use CERF funds to provide Emergency Shelter cash assistance packages (cash for shelter repairing i.e. procuring rebuilding materials for roofing, fencing, partition and decongestion of accommodation, shelter tools including labor cost for house repair) and technical support for fully and partially damaged houses of female-headed households. 61,334 people will benefit from this project, which will be implemented within 6 months.
